verses.name: Matthew 21:39
verses.text: And they caught him, and cast him out of the vineyard, and slew him.

verses.name: Matthew 21:40
verses.text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh, what will he do unto those husbandmen?

verses.name: Matthew 21:41
verses.text: They say unto him, He will miserably destroy those wicked men, and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen, which shall render him the fruits in their seasons.

verses.name: Matthew 21:42
verses.text: Jesus saith unto them, Did ye never read in the scriptures, The stone which the builders rejected, the same is become the head of the corner: this is the Lord’s doing, and it is marvellous in our eyes?
